definition: beneath the surface of the earth, conducted with or marked by hidden aims or methods, an electric railway operating below the surface of the ground (usually in a city)
details:
adverb
- beneath the surface of the earth
= example: beneath the surface of the earth
- in or into hiding or secret operation
= example: in or into hiding or secret operation
adjective
- conducted with or marked by hidden aims or methods
= synonyms: hugger-mugger
- under the level of the ground
= synonyms: belowground
noun
- an electric railway operating below the surface of the ground (usually in a city)
= example: an electric railway operating below the surface of the ground (usually in a city)
= synonyms: metro, tube, subway system, subway
- a secret group organized to overthrow a government or occupation force
= synonyms: resistance
